meanings.definition: The daughters of one's niece or nephew.
meanings.sent1: My grandnieces love playing in the park with their cousins.
meanings.sent2: During the family reunion, I enjoyed spending time with my grandnieces.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous grandnieces decided to prank their uncle by hiding his keys.
meanings.sent4: The grandnieces' laughter filled the room, bringing joy to everyone.
meanings.sent5: As the youngest grandnieces, they were always pampered by their relatives.
